title: Bigsun Chef Gyutou Knife 67 Layers VG 10 Forged High Carbon Damascus Steel Kitchen cooking Knives with Resin Honeycomb Design Handle (7Inch Nakiri Knife, Brown)
features: MULTI-FUNCTIONAL KNIFE--It’s a All-Purpose Professional Kitchen Damascus santoku Knife, can be perfect chopping, mincing, slicing, and dicing vegetables, fruits and meat. Great for professional chefs, culinary experts, food caterers and for novice home chefs.

SUPER SHARP EDGE --Made of 67 Layers Japanese Damascus Super Steel with fine polishing surface.Corrosion resistance and strong toughness.Manual convex sharp edge,more durable and easier to sharpening.Using vacuum heat treatment hardness could be stable at 60±2HRC,durable sharpness.
PARTICULAR MICARTA HANDLE--Use for a long time not to distort, not faded, not shrinking, tasteless environmental protection .Comfortable and ergonomic touching,nice finishing.
A AMAZING GIFT--The superior damascus knife with gift box is a exquisite gift to your parents,family and friends.For all Home Cooks and Professional Chefs.
100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE-- We promise a superior product that will give you a lifetime of exemplary service, try it risk free, we know you'll love it!
description: 1.67 layers Damascus Super Steel with fine polishing surface.Corrosion resistance and strong toughness.Manual convex sharp edge,more durable and easier to sharpening. 2.Handle is made by pakka wood.Comfortable and ergonomic touching,nice finishing. 3.Using vacuum heat treatment hardness could be stable at 60±2HRC,durable sharpness. 4.Using high quality gift box.Suitable for personal using or as gift. 5.The knife can easy to cut meat tomatoes,potatoes,onions,carrots,vegetable,fruit,etc. 6.Use multi-process to sharpen edge the sharpness of edges will be more durable,can easy to cut various ingredients and make sure the original taste of ingredients.

1.Clean and dry the knife after using,and place the knife to dry place. 2.Don’t use finger to test knife’s sharpness and keep away from children. 3.Don’t use the knife to cut bone,frozen meat and other hard things. 4.Sharpen the blade regularly by whetstone to maintain the sharp edge.
1 x Damascus Kitchen Knife 1 x Premium Gift Box
